column4: hey wondering if you could advise me on which proggramming language to learn on my ubuntu machine , i have touched on many languages and am able to write a simple program in most but was wondering which one youd advise me to learn , needs to be popular , easy to learn but i want to be able to do more advanced stuff aswell e.g. bluetooth programming thanks =)
there are no tuts for BT programming afaik. in any language
